Sentencas: The development of oxygen reductive reaction (ORR) electrocatalyst with high-stability, conductivity and activity is of great importance for improving the conversion efficiency of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Although the ORR performance of LaFeO3 perovskite (LFO) is not excellent, it is a promising cathode for SOFC duo to its low-cost peculiarity and adequate compatibility with electrolyte.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: In this work, the Ni-Nb and Sr were partially doped to Fe and La sites of LFO, respectively, to evaluate the doping effect on ORR ability.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: The increased formation energy illustrated that Nb-doping significantly enhanced the stability of LFO, while Ni-3d band emerged as the minimum conductive band mainly contributed to reduce the band gap.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Moreover, the overpotential of LFO with Sr-doping (LSFO) was sharply reduced from 0.60 V to 0.34 V, which was possibly attributed to the decrease of eg-filling (less than 2), and hence increased the binding energy.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Although surface O-vacancy (Ov) is more favorable to be induced than sublayer, the sublayer Ov facilitates to reduce the ORR overpotential.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite

Sentencas: The electron variation exploration of Sr-Ni-Nb codoped LFO provides important guidance for the design of high-efficient ORR catalyst for SOFC with high stability, and superior conductivity, as well as low overpotential.
Titulo: A first-principles study of doping effect on enhancing ORR performance of Sr-Ni-Nb co-doped LaFeO3 perovskite
